column1: # This file appears to be unused, is causing Validator issues, and has a good number of typos, so it is commented out for now

column2: It is good to pay respect to the elders of your house. However, after drinking much wine, [arrogentelder_target.GetTitledFirstName] has said he holds the power of life or death in the family.
column4: Konfuzianismus ist eine vielfältige Religion mit vier Hauptzweigen: Ren, Li, Zhong und Xiao. Wenn Ihr konvertiert, könnt Ihr einen davon auswählen.
column6: El confucianismo es un religión variada con cuatro ramas principales: Ren, Li, Zhong y Xiao. Cuando te conviertes, debes elegir una.

column2: A bold claim
That must be some good wine.
column4: Ren, menschlichen Altruismus.

column2: As it should be.
column4: J'envoyais mes chasseurs pour rendre le travail.

column2: No way
column3: Ils n'ont mange pas comme un boufet durant Chuseok!.

column2: As an elder of the family you are suprised that [fiftygiftgiver_target.GetFirstName] failed to provide you with a gift for your fiftith birthday. [fiftygiftgiver_target.GetTitledFirstName] looks at you hesitantly "What do you want?".

column2: I want only that you have rose-tinted memories of me.

column2: [FROM.GetFirstName] has asked you for a present for [FROM.GetHisHer] bi-centural birthday. Of course it had completely slipped your mind, so you offered anything. [FROM.GetFirstName] asked for a gift to reflect [FROM.GetHisHer] stature.

column2: A slave named Zhou has proven to be an extremely gifted artist, besides literate. Your head chef asked your [Root.job_steward.GetTitledFirstName] to move him to a different department because he is clearly over-qualified.

column2: [Root.GetChancellorTitledFirstName] looked suprised when you discussed bone oracles with him today. You have scored perfect on the tests your tutors have arranged for you. Doubtless there is limited benefit of knowing how to spell 'molusk perfume' or 'turtle shell', but you feel a mastery that the civil officals will appreciate. The hardest part will be keeping this a secret.

column2: [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName] has come with quite startling news. The number one problem that stops easy mobility between the estate and city is wild dogs. The canines have multiplied rapidly due to butchers throwing meat outside city limits, their packs have turned on game, livestock and commoners to feed their appetitates.
